bug.author: zhiqwang
bug.summary: Tutorials need to be updated to work with TensorFlow 2.0
bug.description: Hi, Thanks for your cool work. But the tutorial of adanet (vesion 0.8.0) seems incompatible with tensorflow 2.0, would you please add more tutorials here?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/zhiqwang>@zhiqwang</denchmark-link> : You're right, we need to update our tutorials to use TF 2.
This should be relatively easy to port over, using tf.compat.v1 for missing modules.
As per <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/upgrade#compatibility_modules>this</denchmark-link> , you should try to use the new modules instead of using compat.v1 everywhere.
